item.title: T-Shirt Design Masterclass In Photoshop | Sell Your T-Shirt
item.description: In this course you will learn How to create or design your own custom T-Shirt In Photoshop. This course is for Intermediate skill levels, so you will find this course easy to follow if you have basic photoshop knowledge. You will learn how to design a fire fighter tshirt, how to design hero soldier or I’d rather die like a man than live like a coward tagline design, how to design a wanted black and white tshirt, how design a lumberjack tshirt using only with elements.

item.title: Affinity Publisher Guide - Affinity Publisher for Beginners
item.description: Welcome to Affinity Publisher Guide - Affinity Publisher for Beginners! The only course you will need to start with Affinity Publisher, one of the best publishing software in the industry. Affinity Publisher is an easy-to-use desktop publishing software that helps you create beautiful layouts with custom graphics and images in minutes. It's the perfect choice for a graphic designer who wants to take on a more creative role, or for someone who has always wanted to create their own book, magazine, or brochure.

item.title: Learn Basics of Adobe Photoshop CC 2021 for Beginners
item.description: Want to learn Photoshop but don’t know where to start from? This course is well designed and prepared to make you a decent Photoshop user. The initial chapters are basics and further chapters are explained in more details without making things overcomplicated. To help you follow along with the lectures, exercise files are included in each chapter.

item.title: »PHOTOSHOP | realiza 100 DISEÑOS en un minuto «
item.description:
Desde hace tiempo estas usando Photoshop ya sea como fotógrafo, diseñador o community manager, sin embargo, a pesar de que manejas muy bien el programa en tu área de interés, tu flujo de trabajo es sumamente lento, durando horas en procesos que te consumen todo el tiempo.
En este curso avanzado de Photoshop te desvelo todos mis secretos para que al igual que yo puedas tener un flujo de trabajo acelerado, gracias a los procesos automatizados de Photoshop.

item.title: Professional Adobe Photoshop CC Course With Advance Training

Motion Graphics and Visual Effects are becoming increasingly valuable and important in any video created. Learning how to create these animations using Adobe After Effects has become essential.

item.title: Graphic Design: Side Hustle to Self-Employed
item.description: Are you thinking about going full-time as a freelancer in graphic design? Even if you are just ramping up your freelance life after hours, this class will give you a bunch of tools and tips that will set you up for success! It's a huge endeavor to get a business off the ground - especially if the business is in creative production ( like graphic design, 3D modeling, illustration, etc). Not only are you responsible for your day-to-day deliverables, but you also have to market yourself, bill clients, network, and so much more!

item.title: A complete Website Development tool without Programming
item.description: Free Website Designing without Programming Language : Once you pay for your web design, you are the owner of your website. We don’t use any proprietary software to keep you locked down. You’re free to take your website with you and make any changes. Dynamic CMS Get a site with all dynamic options of CMS. Site will be mobile ready and fit itself into any browser. Features We give you Blog, Photo / Video Gallery, News, Testimonial, Contact Form with Map with easy frontend editing option.

item.title: Photoshop Challenge
item.description: Adobe Photoshop es el programa más potente del mercado para la transformación, retoque y reparación de imágenes digitales, así como para la elaboración de todo tipo de creatividades. Este curso pretende ser un curso diferente. Aprenderemos jugando! A través de 9 ejercicios, 9 retos de una dificultad creciente, este curso nos proporcionará todas las habilidades necesarias para tener un conocimiento profundo de las herramientas más importantes de Adobe Photoshop. Se trata de un curso eminentemente práctico en donde se proponen 10 ejercicios para que el alumno los realice primero por si solo antes de ver el video y ponga a prueba sus conocimientos.

item.title: Ultimate Adobe Photoshop CC Masterclass Basics To Advanced
item.description: Learn Adobe Photoshop CC From Scratch & Ultimate Photoshop Masterclass Course For Newbie. If you are a beginner and looking to learn photoshop from scratch then this course will help you to learn Adobe Photoshop Professionally. For learning graphics design and photoshop retouching from beginner to advanced this course can be a lighthouse for you. You can learn from this course about Photoshop Layer, Color and Adjustment, Photoshop Color Correction, Shape and Symbol, Content-Aware & Cropping, Photoshop Text Style, Gradient Stroke & Bevel, Shadow, Blending, Selection, Photoshop Masking, Blur & Filters, Transform, Warp & Distort, Clipping Mask, Retouch, Photoshop Retouching, Effect Of Visual Style, Brush, Export, Earning Money With Graphics Design Work, Advance Tool and many more.

item.title: Graphic Design - Passive Income Downloads & Self Publishing
item.description: -- Updated 6/28/21, remixed audio on all lessons -- So what is the deal with selling downloads and print-on-demand (AKA Self Publishing)? The answers are in this class! It doesn't matter how far along you are in your creative arts business, how old you are, how extensive your portfolio is - setting up downloads NOW creates passive future income for years to come. PLUS I show you how you can use them NOW as your own marketing tools while having the same items pull double duty as passive income streams.

item.title: Learn User Experience Design from A-Z: Adobe XD UI/UX Design
item.description: Welcome to the Learn User Experience Design from A-Z: Adobe XD UI UX Design Where you’re going to learn how to get started with User Experience and User Interface Design (UX/UI) Design and how to land your first job as a UX Designer even if you have no prior knowledge or experience. In this practical, hands-on course our main objective is to give you the education not just to understand the ins and outs of UX and UI Design, but also to learn exactly how the web development industry works, the different roles within a team, how color psychology and color schemes work , so you can learn first hand exactly how to design websites and mobile apps in Adobe XD and create an amazing user experience as a UX & UI Designer.

item.title: Procreate: Getting Started With Procreate on the iPad (2021)
item.description: Learn how to use Procreate 5X on the iPad with the Apple Pencil for digital art, illustration, drawing and painting. The iPad (Pro, Air 3, Mini 5, iPad 7) with Procreate 5X can be turned into a mini art studio, a powerful digital drawing tool that you can take with you anywhere. Procreate is one of the best digital art apps in the world of digital art. I believe in the Learning by Doing principle.

item.title: Graphic Design - Bulletproof Freelance Business
item.description: Creating the graphics is only one part of the job! There is so much more that goes on behind the scenes that can eat into your design time - and PROFITS - if you don’t have your business model set up to protect you and create a transparent and open designer/client relationship at the same time. Running a small business always has a fair share of the unexpected. Things happen outside the usual ‘get hired - do the design - get paid’ operations that can slow you down.

item.description: Do you want to learn 3D modelling quickly & easily by creating trendy low poly artwork? You can do it in this course and learn the basics of Cinema 4D by creating a Low Poly Planet! item.title: The Ultimate Voice to 3D Animation Course
item.description: "3D animation is a technique which allows for each object or person to have their own three-dimensional space; this can create the illusion of depth while simultaneously creating motion within that world." Good 3D animation is hard to create or execute and we all know it. What we must further be aware of is what is harder still is being committed to it in the long run as 3D animation is a vast, tiring and long process.

item.title: Complete Adobe Animate Megacourse: Beginner to Expert
item.description: Have you ever wanted to learn how to animate? From childhood and adult favourites like Disney, to advertisements and short films, animation is all around us. Whether you’re an artist out to create original and fan content like short films and sketches, or a designer looking to expand their professional portfolio, animation isn’t just for the professionally-trained artist. Even someone with no animation background can learn the skills and start creating beautiful pieces of art - and we’re here to teach you how.

item.title: Adobe Photoshop CC Crash Course Learn Photoshop In Two Hour
item.description: Hi There, I am Stephen Koel Soren and I am a Graphics and Web Expert. item.title: Complete Course of After Effects: Learn From an Expert
item.description: Hi. This is Mohammad Fazel, motion designer and i have 10 years of experience in this field. I'll be glad to share my exprience in After Effects with you. in this course, I'll explore all capabilities that After Effects has in making Motion graphics and visual Effects. after watching this course, you'll absolutely be ready to enter the world of motion graphics and visual effects. you don't need any prior knowledge for this course and I'll teach you from introducing you to after effects to the point that you learn everything about the software.
